acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing and using GarrSYS, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our system.
GarrSYS is a business management platform designed to facilitate the administration of products, sales, business partners and related operations.

usage.title: 2. System Usage
content: The GarrSYS system is intended exclusively for internal use by the organization and its authorized members. You agree to:
list: Use the system responsibly and in accordance with the law
Maintain the confidentiality of your access credentials
Not attempt to access areas of the system for which you are not authorized
Not share sensitive information outside the platform
Report any suspicious activity or security vulnerabilities

roles.title: 3. Roles and Permissions
content: GarrSYS implements a role-based system with different access levels:
list: ADMIN: Full system access, user management and configuration
DISTRIBUTOR: Product, inventory and business operations management
PARTNER: Access to relevant information and specific functionalities
CLANDESTINE: Special operations with limited permissions
SHELBY: Supervision and approval of strategic decisions

responsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
content: As a GarrSYS user, you are responsible for all activities performed under your account. You must immediately notify any unauthorized use of your account.
Information entered into the system must be accurate and up-to-date. Incorrect data can affect business operations.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
content: All content, design, source code and functionalities of GarrSYS are property of the organization and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.
Copying, modifying, distributing or selling any part of the system without express authorization is not permitted.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
content: GarrSYS is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for data loss, service interruptions or damages arising from the use of the system.
It is the user's responsibility to maintain backups of critical information.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication in the system.
It is the user's responsibility to periodically review these terms.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: GarrSYS collects and stores information necessary for the operation of the business management system. This information includes:
list: Profile data: name, email, username
Role and permission information within the system
Product, inventory and business transaction data
Activity logs and system audits
Business partner and distributor information

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: The information collected is used exclusively for the following purposes:
list: User account management and authentication
Inventory and business operations administration
Report and business statistics generation
Transaction auditing and tracking
Business-related communications
System improvement and optimization

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information:
list: Password encryption using Argon2
JWT (JSON Web Tokens) based authentication
Role-based access control (RBAC)
Audit logs of critical actions
Protection against unauthorized access

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Information
content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
list: When necessary to comply with legal obligations
With authorized business partners within the system
To protect the organization's rights and security
In case of merger, acquisition or asset sale

retention.title: 5. Data Retention
content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, including legal, accounting or audit requirements.
Business transaction data is maintained in accordance with applicable tax and accounting regulations.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
content: As a GarrSYS user, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
list: Access the information we have about you
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your account and associated data
Export your data in a structured format
Withdraw consent for data processing

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
content: GarrSYS uses localStorage and sessionStorage to maintain your active session and improve user experience. For more details, see our Cookie Policy.

changes.title: 8. Changes to this Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through the system.
The last updated date is shown at the top of this document.

what.title: 1. What are Cookies and Storage Technologies?
content: Cookies are small text files that are stored in your browser when you visit a website. GarrSYS uses modern web storage technologies to enhance your experience.
We primarily use localStorage and sessionStorage instead of traditional cookies to manage sessions and user preferences.

technologies.title: 2. Technologies We Use
content: GarrSYS employs the following storage technologies:
list: localStorage: To store authentication tokens and persistent preferences
sessionStorage: For temporary data during your session
IndexedDB: For local storage of application data (if applicable)

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Local Storage
content: We use these technologies for the following essential purposes:
list: Maintain your active session while navigating the system
Remember your language preferences (English/Spanish)
Store JWT tokens for secure authentication
Save user interface settings
Improve performance through data caching

types.title: 4. Types of Storage We Use
list: Strictly Necessary: Authentication tokens (accessToken, refreshToken) - These are essential for system operation
Functional: Language preferences and user configuration - Improve your system experience
Performance: Data cache to reduce server calls - Optimize system speed

management.title: 5. Stored Data Management
content: You have full control over the data stored in your browser:
list: You can log out at any time to delete authentication tokens
You can manually clear localStorage from browser developer tools
Session tokens automatically expire after a period of inactivity
When closing the browser, sessionStorage data is automatically deleted

security.title: 6. Security
content: Stored tokens are protected by the following measures:
list: JWT tokens are cryptographically signed
Refresh tokens have a limited lifespan
We do not store passwords in the browser
Sensitive data is encrypted before being stored

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Cookies
content: GarrSYS does not use third-party cookies for advertising or tracking. However, if we integrate external services in the future (such as analytics or maps), they may set their own cookies.
We will notify you of any changes in the use of third-party cookies.

disable.title: 8. How to Disable Storage
content: If you wish to disable local storage, you can do so from your browser settings. However, please note that this will significantly affect system functionality:
list: You will not be able to log in or maintain your active session
Your language preferences will not be saved
The user experience will be degraded

updates.title: 9. Updates to this Policy
content: We may update this Cookie Policy when we implement new functionalities or storage technologies.
The last updated date is shown at the top of this document.
